Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 950 Pilot Rd. is a front loaded industrial building with ±8,607 - 21,096 SF available.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
ESTABLISHED BUSINESS LOCATION
•	The property is located on Grier Dr. just south of East Sunset Rd. This location offers superior regional connectivity and is a convenient commute as a central location for both Las Vegas and Henderson residents.
 
•	The project is 3 miles from the Las Vegas Strip which  includes 41+ hotels, shows and attractions, Allegiant Stadium, and ± 11,296,470 SF of convention space, as well as a population of more than 350,000 people and workforce of more than 288,000 employees. 
 
•	Las Vegas offers a strong business environment, supported by Nevada’s pro-business regulations, business-friendly local municipality, ideal time-zone advantage, diverse workforce and competitive labor market. Tax advantages in Las Vegas include: No corporate income tax, personal income tax, franchise tax on income, inventory tax, inheritance or gift tax, unitary tax or estate tax.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
INVESTMENT HIGHLIGHTS
EXCEPTIONAL INDUSTRIAL OWNER-USER PROPERTY 
•	This highly upgraded, concrete tilt up, single tenant industrial building is conveniently located in the Airport Submarket, immediately adjacent to McCarran International Airport and exceptional access to the 215 Beltway.
•	The property is ±41,439 square feet with ± 25,869 square feet of industrial space and ± 15,570 square feet of high image office that includes a finished 2nd floor with an elevator. Current owner invested $5.7M in improvements to the industrial warehouse/office space making the property attractive for an owner user or investor. This immaculate and modern build out makes for an ideal corporate headquarters.
•	901 Grier Drive is located within the Hughes Airport Center, Las Vegas’ premier master-planned industrial corporate park. The Hughes Airport Center is located within the Airport Submarket, one of the most supply-restricted submarkets in Las Vegas. 

•	Located on a ± 2.09 acre lot, this property provides ± 100 free-surface spaces which provide parking that is above the total parking required for Manufacturing/Industrial/ Warehousing. The property has excellent egress/ingress, 660a/480v, 3-phase power an evaporative cooled warehouse with fire sprinklers.

Craig Road Interchange and is ±1.1 miles away. Current zoning is General Commercial District (C-2) in Las Vegas Jurisdiction. The previous tenant occupied the space as a vehicle maintenance facility. The secure yard can accommodate use of heavy equipment.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: +/-4,400 SF freestanding warehouse/office with +/-1,140 SF office and +/-3,260 SF warehouse situated on +/-2.76 acres secure yard. The warehouse offers four (4) +-/12' x +/-14' grade level doors, 3 phase power, and 16' warehouse clear height.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The industrial warehouse is South of Flamingo Road and West of Valley View Boulevard. The area offers excellent access to Las Vegas Boulevard,McCarran International Airport,and Interstate 15(I-15).

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The ±115,619 SF industrial warehouse was built in 1971 and the site was expended in 1986,1991,and 1995. The industrial warehouse has 33,076SF available for lease broken into three units that can be leased together or separately. Column spacing for the units are 20' x 80' and there is dock and grade level loading.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 5380 S. Valley View Boulevard is located in the Heart of the Southwest Submarket with direct frontage on Valley View Blvd, just West of Allegiant Stadium.

Oquendo Road is a ±20,024 SF Free-Standing Industrial Building on ±0.91 acre lot featuring 100% Evap-Cooled Warehouse Space, Fully Fire-Sprinklered, Three (3) Grade Level Loading Doors, ±17’4” Minimum Warehouse Clear Height, New Exterior Lighting, New Glass Storefront Entry, New Drought Tolerant Landscaping, Warehouse Skylights, ±700 Amp, 120/240 Volt, 3 Phase Power, and 50’ x 20’ Column Spacing; M-1 Industrial Zoning (Clark County).

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the West Henderson submarket near Saint Rose Parkway and Bermuda Road. The project provides excellent access to I-15 North or South bound allowing access to the entire Las Vegas Valley or nearby transit stations.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Unit 116 is a ±3,739 SF above-ground office unit; extremely private with exclusive elevator access; 100% office space; 6 private offices, 2 restrooms, kitchen, and large conference room.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Hacienda Crossing is located on the NWC of Arville Street and Hacienda. South of Tropicana Avenue and West of Interstate I-15 and McCarran International Airport and just north of the 215 Freeway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Hacienda Crossing consists of Contemporary Office / Showroom / and 100% air-conditioned Warehouse spaces with beautiful landscaping and attractive store fronts. Fully built-out and move-in ready with dock high loading, free covered parking, 3-phase power, 18' minimum clear height warehouse, M-1 light industrial zoning, fire sprinkler system and skylights; built in 1998.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Unit 108 totals ±30,476 SF which includes ±6,000 SF of HVAC office space, ±24,476 SF of EVAP Cooled warehouse, thirteen (13) private offices, five (5) restrooms, twelve (12) dock-hi loading doors, six (6) Grade-level loading doors, ESFR fire sprinklers, ±25' Clear Height, ample 277/480 volt, 3-phase power. To request additional information or to schedule a showing, please contact Mike Willmore at 702-369-4823.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Grade level loading doors (12'x14’) | Dock-hi truck doors (9’x10’)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Eldorado Business Park is located near the intersection of Warm Springs Road and Dean Martin Drive, less than 5 minutes from the I-15 Freeway, McCarran International Airport, the Allegiant Stadium, the Las Vegas ‘Strip’ and UNLV and is conveniently located near multiple retail amenities, including the ±117-acre Town Square retail development on Las Vegas Blvd.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Eldorado Business Park is a ±208,076 SF Project on ±15.08 Acres located less than 5 minutes from the I-15 Freeway, McCarran International Airport, the Allegiant Stadium, the Las Vegas ‘Strip’ and UNLV and is conveniently located near multiple retail amenities, including the ±117-acre Town Square retail development on Las Vegas Blvd.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located just North of the I-215 & Rainbow Blvd Freeway Interchange, in Las Vegas' Southwest industrial submarket.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Mountain West Industrial Park is a brand-new, multi-tenant industrial project on approximately 31.2 acres, located at Rainbow Boulevard, just North of the I-215 Beltway.  The property consists of three (3) multi-tenant distribution buildings with ±30' Minimum Clear Height, BTS office space, evaporative cooled warehouse, LED warehouse lighting, ESFR fire sprinklers and grade level and dock-hi truck loading.
Building 4 is a ±38,800 SF Freestanding "Build-To-Suit", ±30' Clear Height, Warehouse/Distribution Building with twelve (12) dock-high and six (6) grade level truck doors. Delivering Q3 2022.
For additional information, please contact Dean Willmore, Alex Stanisic or Lauren Willmore at 702-369-4800.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: PSi Commerce Center is located near W. Warm Springs Road and Rainbow Boulevard in the Southwest submarket. The "Class A" Industrial/flex warehouses are zoned M-D in Clark County Jurisdiction.
